entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's office is described as a circular room with sleeping portraits. This suggests that Dumbledore has an office in this location.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is the protagonist who enters Dumbledore's office and interacts with the wizened wizard.

entities.name: wizard
entities.description: The wizened, frail-looking wizard is introduced as a character in Dumbledore's office. He is reading a letter by candlelight.

relationships.description: Harry tries to interact with the wizened wizard, but he ignores him.
Harry enters Dumbledore's office and finds the wizened wizard reading a letter.
